gcci.text: With H100 prices stabilizing at $3.16/hr, chip availability is improving but capex commitments remain cautious as supply chain constraints ease.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's aggressive $1.25/1M token pricing is intensifying API price wars while driving efficiency gains across the competitive model landscape.

gagl.text: AI infrastructure's 120 TWh annual energy load is straining grids and accelerating nuclear power adoption as carbon footprint concerns mount.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment shows cautious optimism as price competition and energy concerns create sustainable growth patterns while bubble risks remain elevated.
